msg: o Copy some configuration from plugins-parent. This plugin used to inherit that configuration from the plugin-parent before the move.

author: mmartinec
msg: bug 5662: recognize author signature and multiple signatures for whitelisting (with Mail::DKIM 0.29); disable useless "check_dkim_signsome"; new eval rules "check_dkim_valid_author_sig" and "check_dkim_valid" (an alias for a "check_dkim_verified" misnomer); new tags _DKIMIDENTITY_ and _DKIMDOMAIN_; updated terminology; verification speedup with Mail::DKIM 0.30 (or its pre-releases)

author: dennisl
msg: o Minor tweaks to the documentation.
